name: Lost Shoes
description:
Everyone in the outside world is crazy anyways, but damn it, you need to get your red shoes back for some much needed razzle-dazzle in your life.

It's a platformer with a story. Try the speedrun mode after playing through the story. Can you find all the glitches to exploit? How fast can you go through the game?

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Left shift to sprint

F to shoot
